title: Tales of Zestiria the Cross: Saiyaku no Jidai
synopsis: In recent years, problems regarding atmospheric instability have greatly burdened the Hyland Kingdom, affecting the quality of crops and the citizens' health across the region. One day, the people of Guriel discover an eerie cloud of mist hovering over their town; its severity captures the attention of royal princess Alisha Diphda.
voices: ['Kayano, Ai', 'Komatsu, Mikako', 'Koyasu, Takehito', 'Koyama, Mami', 'Igarashi, Hiromi', 'Kokido, Shiho', 'Terasoma, Masaki', 'Morinaga, Chitose', 'Kakuma, Ai', 'Hirose, Jun']
